pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Data with CodeCraft Forge CodeCraft HOME ABOUT US Product Contact Get Started Privacy Policy for CodeCraft CodeCraft operates the CodeCraft.com website (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our Service. Information We Collect We collect personal information like your name, phone number, and postal address, **if you choose to provide it**, to enhance your experience. This information is used for identification and potential contact. Log Data We automatically collect standard Log Data, including your IP address, browser version, visited pages, and time spent on those pages, when you visit our Service. Cookies We use cookies, small data files, to improve our Service functionality. You can choose to accept or refuse cookies and be notified when they are sent to your device. Refusing cookies may limit your access to certain parts of the Service. Third-Party Providers We may employ third parties for various purposes, such as facilitating the Service, providing services on our behalf, or analyzing Service usage. These parties have access to your personal information only to perform designated tasks and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. Security We strive to protect your personal information using commercially acceptable methods. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Links to Other Sites Our Service may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before visiting them. Children's Privacy Our Service is not intended for anyone under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover such data is collected, we will immediately delete it. Parents and guardians are advised to monitor their children's online activity and contact us if they believe their child has provided personal information. Updates We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We encourage you to review this page regularly for any changes. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy here. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us. The CodeCraft website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline CodeCraft Contact Us 3VFJ+9M2, MIG Colony, Vinobha Bhave Nagar, Kurla West, Kurla, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400070, India codecraft@gmail.com Important Links Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions
